text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +8 [[Charge]] Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 [[Charge]] Count to 1 other ally with the least [[Charge]] Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 3)

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +8 [[Charge]] Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 [[Charge]] Count to 1 other ally with the least [[Charge]] Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 4)
- At 4+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +12 [[Charge]] Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 [[Charge]] Count to 1 other ally with the least [[Charge]] Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max <style="highlight">5)
- At 4+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies
<style="highlight">- At 6+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies

passiveList.name: Overloading Cables
passiveList.desc:
Combat Start: At 4+ Reson., gain 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp].
If the Reson. was an Envy Reson., apply the above effects to the 2 units adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard as well

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain Atk Weight equal to (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 10+ [Charge] Count, spend up to 20 [Charge] Count; deal +2% damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max 40%)

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain Atk Weight equal to (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max <style="highlight">3)
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 10+ [Charge] Count, spend up to 20 [Charge] Count; deal +<style="highlight">2.5% damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">50%)

text.name: Electric Screaming
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain Atk Weight equal to (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 3)
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [Charge] Count, apply the effects applied from 'On Hit' twice
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 10+ [Charge] Count, spend up to 20 [Charge] Count; deal +<style="highlight">3% damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">60%)
